channel.title: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 client error
channel.description:
Hey M8's got this client error today, could use some help if u know what to do. [Project Insanity source] no idea what client, it just came with source ______________________________________
The error i get is T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 and then after that it just spams 950trillion billion Java.Lang.NullPointerException
any idea on how to fix or stop this? I followed this guide here,
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/380359-t1-123-0-36-36-fix.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/380359-t1-123-0-36-36-fix.html[/url]
and commented out the crash thing in both files, the error doesn't show anymore, but the nullpointerexception spams 950 trillion billion times still
Help Please
Here is a picture
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fm305x.jpg[/img]

so what would i edit in the client class, and how do i fix the path,

the path to a file that is loading upon log in is missing or wrong.

item.title: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 client error
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

the path to a file that is loading upon log in is missing or wrong.

remove getPA().sendCrashFrame(); from the Client class server sided.

Read full topic
